amendment.description: An amendment to cut aid to Pakistan.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for aid to Pakistan by $430 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 117 - 315 (Roll no. 340).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
